title: Morning Joe 6/22/21
description: The Senate is scheduled to vote Tuesday on whether to advance the Democrats' sweeping election overhaul legislation, an attempt that is likely to be thwarted by a Republican-backed filibuster.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
